timeline.message:
add sendSignedTransaction method to QuorumEnclave

Signed-off-by: Stefan Pingel <stefan.pingel@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: We have stopped using hash to name the transaction lookup id, haven't we? What about renaming it to txLookupId or something like that?
timeline.author: lucassaldanha

replies.bodyText: That is a good idea. I've named it hash, because that name is used in json ...
replies.author: pinges
